description: A walking tour led by Footways London that demonstrates the guiding principles of the Camden Green Loop, a strategy to build public spaces that better serve local communities, including the Camden Highline.

factsheet.heading: Making Camden pedestrian friendly
paragraphs: People love to explore different parts of London and find out the hidden details that make them special. Buildings and the public realm are great for this and things get even more exciting when new interventions are revealed. The Camden Green Loop is all about making the local area more accessible and walkable, with a long-term view of ways to embed creative responses into the borough.

name: Camden Green Loop Walking Tour
